    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_93088</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The flywheel of a bus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Schwungrad eines Busses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le volant d'un bus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O volante de uma barra-ônibus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il volano di un bus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο σφόνδυλος ενός διαδρόμου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La rueda volante de un megabus</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the flywheel used in modern buses to store kinetic energy of the bus when it slows down.  This stored energy is transferred back to the bus when it starts moving.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">energy stored</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">energy transfer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">flywheel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">kinetic energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt das Schwungrad, das in den 
modernen Bussen benutzt wird, um kinetische Energie des Busses zu 
speichern, wenn sie verlangsamt. Diese gespeicherte Energie wird
zurück zu dem Bus übertragen, wenn sie anfängt zu bewegen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le volant utilisé dans
des bus modernes pour enregistrer l'énergie cinétique du bus quand 
elle ralentit. Cette énergie enregistrée est transférée de 
nouveau au bus quand elle commence à se déplacer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o volante usado em 
barras-ônibus modernas armazenar a energia cinética da barra-ônibus
quando retarda para baixo. Esta energia armazenada está 
transferida para trás à barra-ônibus quando começa se mover.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il volano utilizzato 
in bus moderni per memorizzare l'energia cinetica del bus quando 
rallenta. Questa energia memorizzata è trasferita di nuovo al 
bus quando comincia muoversi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει το σφόνδυλο που 
χρησιμοποιείται στους σύγχρονους διαδρόμους στην κινητική 
ενέργεια καταστημάτων του διαδρόμου όταν επιβραδύνει. Αυτή
η καταχωρημένη ενέργεια μεταφέρεται πίσω στο διάδρομο όταν 
αρχίζει.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la rueda volante usada 
en megabuses modernos para salvar la energía cinética del megabus 
cuando retrasa. Esta energía salvada se transfiere de nuevo al 
megabus cuando comienza a moverse.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie gespeichert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energieübertragung</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwungrad</string>
          </keyword>
